00044 //----------------------------------------------------------
00045 void
00046 GrMaterialUserParams::Copy( const GrMaterialUserParams* params )
00047 {
00049         _shader = params->_shader;
00050 
00052         _userParamCount = params->_userParamCount;
00053         _userSamplerCount = params->_userSamplerCount;
00054 
00056         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _userParamCount; ++i )
00057                 _userParams[ i ] = params->_userParams[ i ];
00058 
00060         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _userSamplerCount; ++i )
00061                 _userSamplers[ i ] = params->_userSamplers[ i ];
00062 
00064         BindParamsToShader();
00065 }

00067 //----------------------------------------------------------
00068 void
00069 GrMaterialUserParams::SetShader( URef< GrShader > shader )
00070 {
00072         if ( _shader == shader )
00073                 return;
00074 
00076         _shader = shader;
00077         BindParamsToShader();
00078 }

00087 //----------------------------------------------------------
00088 unsigned int
00089 GrMaterialUserParams::AddUserParam( const char* paramName, URef< UExprTerm >* values )
00090 {
00092         B_ASSERT( _shader != 0 );
00093 
00095         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _userParamCount; ++i )
00096         {
00097                 if ( strcmp( _userParams[ i ].name.c_str(), paramName ) == 0 )
00098                 {
00099                         SetUserParam( i, values );
00100                         return i;
00101                 }
00102         }
00103 
00104         if ( _userParamCount == kMaxUserParams )
00105                 return ~0;
00106 
00108         unsigned int handle = ~0;
00109         if ( _shader )
00110         {
00111                 handle = _shader->GetUserParamHandle( paramName );
00112                 if ( handle == ~0 )
00113                         handle = _shader->GenUserParamHandle();
00114         }
00115 
00116         _userParams[ _userParamCount ].name = paramName;
00117         _userParams[ _userParamCount ].handle = handle;
00118         _userParams[ _userParamCount ].flags = kUsed | kDynamic;
00119         _userParams[ _userParamCount ].valueExprs[ 0 ] = values[ 0 ];
00120         _userParams[ _userParamCount ].valueExprs[ 1 ] = values[ 1 ];
00121         _userParams[ _userParamCount ].valueExprs[ 2 ] = values[ 2 ];
00122         _userParams[ _userParamCount ].valueExprs[ 3 ] = values[ 3 ];
00123 
00126         return _userParamCount++;
00127 }
00128

00130 unsigned int
00131 GrMaterialUserParams::GetUserParamHandle( const char* paramName )
00132 {
00133         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _userParamCount; ++i )
00134         {
00135                 if ( strcmp( _userParams[ i ].name.c_str(), paramName ) == 0 )
00136                         return i;
00137         }
00138         return ~0;
00139 }

00142 void
00143 GrMaterialUserParams::SetUserParam( unsigned int handle, URef< UExprTerm >* values )
00144 {
00146         B_ASSERT( handle < _userParamCount );
00147         _userParams[ handle ].flags = kUsed | kDynamic;
00148         _userParams[ handle ].valueExprs[ 0 ] = values[ 0 ];
00149         _userParams[ handle ].valueExprs[ 1 ] = values[ 1 ];
00150         _userParams[ handle ].valueExprs[ 2 ] = values[ 2 ];
00151         _userParams[ handle ].valueExprs[ 3 ] = values[ 3 ];

00154 //----------------------------------------------------------
00155 void
00156 GrMaterialUserParams::SetUserParam( unsigned int handle, float* values )
00157 {
00158         B_ASSERT( handle < _userParamCount );
00159         _userParams[ handle ].flags = kUsed;
00160         _userParams[ handle ].values[ 0 ] = values[ 0 ];
00161         _userParams[ handle ].values[ 1 ] = values[ 1 ];
00162         _userParams[ handle ].values[ 2 ] = values[ 2 ];
00163         _userParams[ handle ].values[ 3 ] = values[ 3 ];

00166 //----------------------------------------------------------
00167 unsigned int
00168 GrMaterialUserParams::AddUserSampler( const char* samplerName, const GrTextureStage& texture )
00169 {
00171         B_ASSERT( samplerName != 0 );
00172 
00174         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _userSamplerCount; ++i )
00175         {
00176                 if ( strcmp( _userSamplers[ i ].name.c_str(), samplerName ) == 0 )
00177                 {
00178                         SetUserSampler( i, texture );
00179                         return i;
00180                 }
00181         }
00182 
00184         if ( _userSamplerCount == kMaxUserSamplers )
00185                 return ~0;
00186 
00188         unsigned int texUnit = USER_SAMPLER_START;
00189         for ( ; texUnit <= USER_SAMPLER_END; ++texUnit )
00190                 if ( !_shader->IsGLSamplerUsed( texUnit ) )
00191                         break;
00192 
00194         _userSamplers[ _userSamplerCount ].name = samplerName;
00195         _userSamplers[ _userSamplerCount ].texUnit = texUnit;
00196         _userSamplers[ _userSamplerCount ].texture = texture;
00197 
00199         if ( texUnit <= USER_SAMPLER_END )
00200                 _shader->BindUserSampler( _userSamplers[ _userSamplerCount].name.c_str(), texUnit );
00201 
00204         return _userSamplerCount++;     
00205 }
00206

00212         B_ASSERT( samplerName != 0 );
00213         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _userSamplerCount; ++i )
00214                 if ( strcmp( _userSamplers[ i ].name.c_str(), samplerName ) == 0 )
00215                         return i;
00216 
00218         return ~0;

00221 //----------------------------------------------------------
00222 void
00223 GrMaterialUserParams::SetUserSampler( unsigned int handle, const GrTextureStage& texture )
00224 {
00226         B_ASSERT( handle < _userSamplerCount );
00227 
00229         _userSamplers[ handle ].texture = texture;
00230 }

00232 //----------------------------------------------------------
00233 void
00234 GrMaterialUserParams::Update()
00235 {
00237         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _userParamCount; ++i )
00238         {
00240                 SUserParam& param = _userParams[ i ];
00241 
00243                 if ( ( param.flags & kUsed ) != 0 && ( param.flags & kDynamic ) != 0 )
00244                 {
00245                         B_ASSERT( param.valueExprs[ 0 ] != 0 );
00246                         B_ASSERT( param.valueExprs[ 1 ] != 0 );
00247                         B_ASSERT( param.valueExprs[ 2 ] != 0 );
00248                         B_ASSERT( param.valueExprs[ 3 ] != 0 );
00249 
00250                         param.values[ 0 ] = param.valueExprs[ 0 ]->GetValue();
00251                         param.values[ 1 ] = param.valueExprs[ 1 ]->GetValue();
00252                         param.values[ 2 ] = param.valueExprs[ 2 ]->GetValue();
00253                         param.values[ 3 ] = param.valueExprs[ 3 ]->GetValue();
00254                 }
00255         }
00256 }
00257 
00258 //----------------------------------------------------------
00259 void
00260 GrMaterialUserParams::ApplyUserParams() const
00261 {
00263         if ( !_shader )
00264                 return;
00265 
00267         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _userParamCount; ++i )
00268         {
00270                 if ( ( _userParams[ i ].flags & kUsed ) != 0 && _userParams[ i ].handle != ~0 )
00271                         _shader->SetUserParam4fv( _userParams[ i ].handle, _userParams[ i ].values );
00272         }
00273 }
00274 
00275 //----------------------------------------------------------
00276 void
00277 GrMaterialUserParams::ApplyUserSamplers() const
00278 {
00280         if ( !_shader )
00281                 return;
00282 
00284         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _userSamplerCount; ++i )
00285         {
00287                 if ( _userSamplers[ i ].texUnit <= USER_SAMPLER_END )
00288                         _userSamplers[ i ].texture.BindTexture( _userSamplers[ i ].texUnit );
00289         }
00290 }

00297 //----------------------------------------------------------
00298 void
00299 GrMaterialUserParams::BindParamsToShader()
00300 {
00302         if ( !_shader )
00303                 return;
00304 
00306         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _userParamCount; ++i )
00307         {
00309                 unsigned int handle = ~0;
00310                 handle = _shader->GetUserParamHandle( _userParams[ i ].name.c_str() );
00311                 if ( handle == ~0 )
00312                         handle = _shader->GenUserParamHandle();
00313 
00315                 _userParams[ i ].handle = handle;
00316         }
00317 
00319         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _userSamplerCount; ++i )
00320         {
00322                 unsigned int texUnit = USER_SAMPLER_START;
00323                 for ( ; texUnit <= USER_SAMPLER_END; ++texUnit )
00324                         if ( !_shader->IsGLSamplerUsed( texUnit ) )
00325                                 break;
00326 
00328                 _userSamplers[ i ].texUnit = texUnit;
00329                 if ( texUnit <= USER_SAMPLER_END )
00330                         _shader->BindUserSampler( _userSamplers[ i ].name.c_str(), texUnit );
00331         }
00332 }
